title: Fetching Sync Committee -- stuck
body:
On v2.40.1 chain goerli, noticed light client stopped logging and syncing when trying to fetch sync committee. Prior to that, all looking healthy. Anything I can try to debug this further?

@AlexeyAkhunov can we have a stable release pretty please?
Same issue here, even with v2.42.0...
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
